reviewText: I have ordered it twice. The first time there was nothing on the disc and the second time it is a foreign film in Spanish but I cannot convert it to English on my computers

Well I had to purchase a DVD player that would play Region 2 movies. But that was only a $45 purchase. Now I get to see lots of movies that they won't put out in DVD form for USA players. I love the setting - wine vineyards - California! Glad I bought it! Worth every cent!
awesome and no trouble it will play in english .great color .great copy the best I have seen.with a multi player.actors do a great job .bring this movie to life.this is one of my favorite movies
